headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DUNN, DR. THEODORE F.

snippet: DUNN--Dr. Theodore F.,passed away on May 23rd, 2016, in Boynton Beach, FL at the age of 89. Ted Dunn worked at Benton and Bowles, and other prominent New York ad agencies, and had his own market research businesses. He was one of the first in the ad industry to develop advertising copy research measures and help set industry guidelines. Highly respected, his career spanned more than 50 years. He is survived by his wife, Gracine Dunn, and three of his four children, Meryl Freeman, Gary Dunn, and Laurence Dunn. He lived in NYC and Florida. Over the years he was an avid sailor, aspiring golfer, and world traveler. He will be greatly missed. 1/3

Ted Dunn worked at Benton and Bowles, and other prominent New York ad agencies, and had his own market research businesses. He is survived by his wife, Gracine Dunn, and three of his four children, Meryl Freeman, Gary Dunn, and Laurence Dunn. He lived in NYC and Florida. Over the years he was an avid sailor, aspiring golfer, and world traveler. He will be greatly missed. 1/3
